artifacts.summary: Partial implementation with structured proof for buildSeedAux_preserves_seedConsistent

partial_progress.details: Session 16: Added helper lemmas box_consistent_implies_content_consistent, all_future_consistent_implies_content_consistent, all_past_consistent_implies_content_consistent. Structured Box/G/H cases in buildSeedAux_preserves_seedConsistent with explicit proof outline. 15 sorries remain requiring: addToAllFamilies_preserves_consistent, addToAllFutureTimes_preserves_consistent, addToAllPastTimes_preserves_consistent, and various well-formedness preservation lemmas.

phase_status.phase_3: IN PROGRESS - 15 sorries in RecursiveSeed.lean (down from original architectural issues)

categories.name: Box case
categories.description: h_psi_in_seed2, h_seed2_cons, h_seed2_wf need addToAllFamilies lemmas

categories.name: G case
categories.description: seed2 consistency (psi derivable from G psi), addToAllFutureTimes lemmas

categories.name: H case
categories.description: seed2 consistency (psi derivable from H psi), addToAllPastTimes lemmas

categories.name: Generic imp case
categories.description: Pattern matching with abstract variables in buildSeedAux

key_additions: box_consistent_implies_content_consistent: If Box phi consistent, then phi consistent
all_future_consistent_implies_content_consistent: If G phi consistent, then phi consistent
all_past_consistent_implies_content_consistent: If H phi consistent, then phi consistent
blocking_issues: Need addToAllFamilies_preserves_consistent: Key lemma showing adding psi to all families preserves seed consistency when Box psi is consistent
Need addToAllFutureTimes_preserves_consistent: Similar for temporal future operator
Need addToAllPastTimes_preserves_consistent: Similar for temporal past operator
Need psi derivable from G/H psi argument for seed2 consistency in temporal cases

completion_data.completion_summary: Session 16 progress: Added 3 key helper lemmas (box_consistent_implies_content_consistent, all_future_consistent_implies_content_consistent, all_past_consistent_implies_content_consistent) and structured the Box/G/H cases in buildSeedAux_preserves_seedConsistent with explicit proof outlines. 15 sorries remain, down from architectural issues. The proof structure is in place but requires addToAllFamilies/FutureTimes/PastTimes_preserves_consistent lemmas.
